casebody.data:
No. 10-8173. Melvin Kross, Petitioner v. Patrick Griffin, Superintendent, Southport Correctional Facility. 562 U.S. 1250, 131 S. Ct. 1516,

179 L. Ed. 2d 362,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1307. February 22, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 403 Fed. Appx. 533.
